QuestData.Title: Eliminate the Outcast
QuestData.Description: You are to kill Zanzil. You rode on Hir'eek's wings and saw through Hir'eek's eyes; you know where Zanzil hides within the Ruins of Aboraz. Travel there and kill him.$b$bOh, and $r: if we become separated, you should use this fetish. It only works within Stranglethorn, but it will transport you back here to me should you need to return swiftly.$b$bGood luck, $r. Zanzil is no ordinary opponent.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: His potion-mixing days are at an end.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to the Ruins of Aboraz in the Cape of Stranglethorn and deal with Zanzil the Outcast.
QuestData.RewardText: You appear to be too late. Zanzil has left Aboraz.
